activities: 3d Travel Metrics, Inc. ("3d")  is a travel management company technology solution provider.  The survey solution allows survey clients to distribute, report and analyze satisfaction levels from surveyed components - most often travel management companies and online booking tools.  The solution also allows customized questions to gain feedback on other travel suppliers (e.g., airlines, hotels, rental car companies, etc.).  3d also provides internal and industry benchmark performance metrics for these rated service metrics, which are designed to help these client companies improve the effectiveness of their managed travel programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
